name: elgatokeycam
description: An application to control Elgato Key Light and bind it to camera activity

scripts.pre-compile: npx tsc && ncc build -o dist/lib/ncc dist/lib/index.js
scripts.build-macos: npm run pre-compile && pkg --target node18-macos-x64 -o dist/macos/elgatokeycam ./dist/lib/ncc/index.js
scripts.build-linux: npm run pre-compile && pkg --target node18-linux-x64 -o dist/linux/elgatokeycam ./dist/lib/ncc/index.js
scripts.build-linux-arm64: npm run pre-compile && pkg --target node18-linux-arm64 -o dist/linux-arm64/elgatokeycam ./dist/lib/ncc/index.js

author: netoabel <abel.neto@gmail.com>
